message.content: Yes, I always encourage screen breaks—especially if you’ve been working or reading for a while. A good rule of thumb is the **20-20-20 rule**: every 20 minutes, look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds. It helps reduce eye strain and mental fatigue. If you’ve been at it for an hour or more, a short walk or stretch can make a real difference. Want a quick reminder or a timer suggestion?

conversation_history.text: Do you encourage users to take screen breaks?

Yes, I always encourage screen breaks—especially if you’ve been working or reading for a while. A good rule of thumb is the **20-20-20 rule**: every 20 minutes, look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds. It helps reduce eye strain and mental fatigue. If you’ve been at it for an hour or more, a short walk or stretch can make a real difference. Want a quick reminder or a timer suggestion?
